title: Kremlin issue major update on Putin's meeting with Zelensky for Ukraine peace talks
content: Zelensky has said Ukraine is ready to hold peace talks at the highest level, including a trilateral meeting with himself, Russian President Vladimir Putin and US President Donald Trump.

title: Donald Trump's White House admits it could SLASH tariffs below 10% for certain countries
content: The remark will doubtless prompt questions about whether the UK agreed to the deal with the US too quickly.

title: Russia in panic as raging infernos break out and residents ordered to evacuate homes
content: The raging inferno quickly spread to the Armenia Market next door and currently covers an area of 2,100 square metres.

title: Flight attendant reveals real reason they wear red lipstick
content: The bold colour serves more than just a fashion statement.

title: Japan preps for WW3 by doubling underground fallout shelters
content: Government has approved plans to double the number of bunkers strong enough to keep people safe from missile attack

title: Hamas Gaza leader Mohammed Sinwar killed in Israeli airstrike
content: Mohammed Sinwar's death comes after his predecessor and brother Yahya, one of the masterminds of the October 7 attacks, was killed by the IDF last year.

title: 'Worst paedophile who ever lived' sentenced after horrific 'atomic bomb' of child abuse
content: JoÃ«l Le Scouarnec, 74, admitted at least 299 horrifying crimes against victims who were mostly under the age of 15.

title: Travel chaos breaks out at major airports with thousands of passengers stranded
content: A video posted to social media channels shows a massive queue of passengers outside one of the capital's airports.

title: Putin told he's made one of the 'biggest strategic and tactical mistake in history'
content: Finnish President Alexander Stubb says Russian counterpart catastrophically underestimated the might of Ukraine's military

title: Major airport grounds ALL FLIGHTS as massive thunderstorm causes travel chaos
content: Thunderstorms are said to be responsible for the move that will cause travel chaos.
